definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Buy vehicles with low NOX emissions, and maintain all vehicles well.
sentences.chinese: 购买少产生氮氧化物的汽车，保持汽车的良好状态。

sentences.english: This paper summarized the methods of decreasing NOx emission from gas turbine .
sentences.chinese: 阐述了燃气轮机降低氮氧化物排放的方法。

sentences.english: NOx is produced when the nitrogen from the air reacts with oxygen under high engine temperature and pressure conditions.
sentences.chinese: 在高温高压下，空气与氧气反应，产生了氮氧化物。

sentences.english: The report includes the first examples of N -oxide arylation with equimolar ratios of the two coupling partners.
sentences.chinese: 纪事第一例子氮氧化物的摩尔比率芳与耦合两个伙伴。

sentences.english: Germany is typical in Europe in controlling NOx emission.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲控制氮氧化物的排放以德国较为典型。

sentences.english: The whole system is stuffed with energy and nitrous oxide emissions.
sentences.chinese: 整个系统都和能源及氮氧化物的排放密切关联。

sentences.english: But while on the farm it's nitrogen oxide and methane.
sentences.chinese: 但是，尽管它在农场的氮氧化物和甲烷。

sentences.english: Many factors can affect NO(subscript X) generation in coal-fired boilers.
sentences.chinese: 影响燃煤锅炉氮氧化物生成的因素很多且规律复杂。

sentences.english: It also generates much less smog-forming nitrogen oxide.
sentences.chinese: 它燃烧产生的烟雾中的氮氧化物也会急剧减少。

definition: fine particle (PM 2.5)/fine particulate matter (air pollution etc)
